org.hps.monitoring.application

Class MonitoringApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.monitoring.application.MonitoringApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener

    final class MonitoringApplication
extends Object
implements ActionListener, PropertyChangeListener
    This is the primary class that implements the data monitoring GUI application.

    It should not be used directly. Instead the Main class should be used from the command line.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  MonitoringApplication.LogHandler
      The default log handler which puts records into the table GUI component.
      (package private) class  MonitoringApplication.MonitoringApplicationStreamHandler
      Log handler which publishes messages to a stream (console or file in this case).
